text:
Jatin! Mast banda hai bhai tu
Last sem mei hee thoda time spend kiya tha wo bhi kam hee pada but jitna bhi tha kaafi fun tha!
Oreo waale din ko soch ke abhi bhi bohot hasi aati hai XD.. bhai tere last words before eating the “bhaang mili hogi chal dede” XD.
Maze aaye basketball khelne mei with you. baaki allrounder to hai hee tu, volleyball, basketball, mediocre hookah lagana :P, high hoke yadu ke room mei dead hona XD..and one of the funniest guy in iitk! 

Abhi aur bakchodi krte hai aage, kyunki ye to bas shuruaat hee thi
author: Jayesh  Narwaria

text:
Yo Soham aka Party animal!
You are the guy jisse koi bhi baat krne mei comfortable hota hai. PUBG Noob. 

Bohot maze kiye bhai saath mei humne, DoAA canteen waale se free mei khaane ki request krne se lekar hall13 se room tak prone hoke aana XD
Debut bhi tune ne hee karaya tha :P.. baaki weekend aane waala hai..
Parties to kaafi kam hee ki hai humne to “Gujarat” trip is closer than you think, spontaneous Delhi trip aur kasol kaafi memorable thhe..

Abhi to kaafi bakchodi karni bachi hai..
author: Jayesh  Narwaria

text:
Teri jitni prashansa karo utni kam hai :P.
Chalo abb tu irritate ho gyi hogi first line se! Kaafi sweet memories hai tere saath
Ganga barrage, IME mei late night walks, Local Train pe slow dance ya antaragni
Kasol trip toh one of the best week tha college life ka you know why :D!

I was lucky ki tujhse 2nd year end mei baat hui aur unlucky ki pehle nahi hui.. You’ve been a great support to me during my low times.. Tera outlook on friendship kaafi sahi hai, and I have copied this from you. You were the reason meri college life itni faad rahi!

Kaafi grow kiya hai tune(not literally :P) in last few years, from being shy girl to being itna open. Placement season mei level 0 se itne kam time itni skills devlop ki.. bohot chillaya bhi hai tune mujhpe XD

Last 1 month of campus mei we had 1 year of memories! I had experienced 1 week JAIL mei band hona aur GF ka milne aana XD.
OAT mei high hoke poori timeline khona XD.. Broad daylight mei empty OAT stairs pe crush krna yaa raat ko 1bje shutter ke neeche se daaru laake bhand hona to bikul expected nahi tha tere saath aur tere bhand hone ke baad to tujhe koi bhi handle nahi kr sakta XD

Jyada to nahi likhunga nahi to ro degi tu :P
MwaaH! <3 u
author: Jayesh  Narwaria

text:
Yadu, Brother from another baapu :P.. Bhai tere saath itni yaadei hai sab dil mei chhapi hui hai! Pehle week mei hee saath mei nikle thhe GH dekh ne XD
first year mei wing mei saath mei interview liye bhai.. 2nd year mei room to party room bann gya tha.. Countless parties aur countless baar tera dead hona XD.. Umeed hai aage buckets ki need nahi hogi tujhe :P 
Baaki tu aisa banda hai jo bhai ki shaadi mei aane ke liye ek nahi do do flight ki ticket karata hai :P
Coolest roomate ever! First year se leke last day iitk ke kaafi bakchodi kari hai bhai saath mei aur aage bhi krte rahenge!
author: Jayesh  Narwaria

text:
Bhai tu kahi aa raha hota hai to dur se pata chalta hai Yogi aa raha hai, bohot kam log honge jismei itni bakchodi aur haramipanti bhari hogi(in a good way) XD Baaki lift waala incident to mast tha hee..
All the best!
author: Jayesh  Narwaria
